trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana seems on the verge of panicking.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_TODO_00<tab>Use the Ananta healing salve on wounded Resistance fighters.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, our ssscouts, they've been attacked! Left for dead by sssome territorial predator!
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_001<tab>The messenger who limped into camp sssays they were ssset upon along their patrol route in Virdjala.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_002<tab>They're in need of immediate attention, and I have no other sssoldiers to sssend. Quickly, take this healing sssalve and find our injured comrades!
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SOLDIERA03067_000_011<tab>Wait, what is that you're smearing on...oh. Oh! The pain is gone!
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SOLDIERA03067_000_012<tab>Thank you! I think...yes, I can make it back on my own now.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SOLDIERB03067_000_013<tab><gasp> Well, that's it then. I'm done for...

TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SOLDIERB03067_000_014<tab>My thanks─you've dragged me back from death's doorstep! I've walked this route a time or two and thought I knew what to expect... I'll be more careful on my way back to the castellum.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_SOLDIERC03067_000_017<tab>I don't know what was in that ointment, but it seems the bleeding's stopped. I'd best report in. My thanks!
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_020<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─all the ssscouts are accounted for.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_021<tab>Were you perhapsss curious about the sssalve I had you use? It is an old Ananta remedy that numbs the wound and clotsss the blood...for a time.

TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_022<tab>As sssuch, these ointmentsss are perfect for emergency treatment out in the field. For long term healing, however, the ressstorative alchemies of your people are far sssuperior.
TEXT_BANANA604_03067_ESHANA_000_023<tab>The Gatekeepers will, of course, ssseek to employ the bessst combination of both. Thank you again for your ssswift assistance.
